# Notes for: R.Version()
# [`R.Version()`]
[[`R.Version`]`()`]
+ [`R.Version()`] returns a list of details about the version of that is currently running.
```{r eval=FALSE}
R.Version()
```
[[`R.version.string`]]
+ [`R.version.string`] is an easier to work with description of your version of R:
```{r eval=FALSE}
R.version.string
```
+ This is useful for extracting the version of R for publications: `stringr::word(R.version.string, 1, 3)`
---
